title: Ticket #5581: [EC2] Insert last 10 lines of console log into EC2 job ads.
description:
John Hover has requested, to aid him and other administrators in debugging, that some fraction (the last 10 lines?) of an instance's console log be inserted in the corresponding job ad.

Given that we're already having problems with request limits, I'm not sure this is something we want to be polling to obtain, so a new command would be needed. This sounds like a useful thing for condor annexes; and since it would probably be easier to introduce a new command there (they're all new), maybe that'd be the right place to start.
creator: tlmiller
